name: The Dark Room (KotGamesInc)
description:
You got yourself a new house. But things are not as they seem. Well... At least in the night. You got cameras set up with a worker Jacob. Check those cameras and stay safe. You never know what's out their in the dark. Close doors and trapdoors to stay safe.  Don't let the demons in. 

Credits to Scott Cawthon for original concept of FNAF

Play for constant updates at: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/621738692
